Lyrics: Jesu Nkosi, ngiyakhala, Nkosi ngisize ngiyafa<BON:nextLine/>Letha ukuphila kwAkho Ungi thathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Ngithathe, Nkosi, Ngithathe ngi nje<BON:nextLine/>Sondeza usindiso, Ungithathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngigcwele izono Jesu, Ngegazi lAkho ngihlanze<BON:nextLine/>Ngokuthanda kwAkho ngenze Ungi thathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Emihle imisebenzi Ayikho kimina Nkosi<BON:nextLine/>Ngebizo lAkho ngi size, Ungithathe nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngiya guqa kuWe Nkosi, Ngibhek' enyaweni zAkho<BON:nextLine/>Umsebenzi uqaliwe, Ungithathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nxa uthanda ngisebenze, Ingqondo yikhaliphise<BON:nextLine/>Mina ungisebenzise Ungithathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ukuphela komsebenzi, Nxa seyiphelile impi<BON:nextLine/>Ukukhala kwami koba Nkosi, ng'thathe ngi nje <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-289, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Ngi Thathe Ngi Nje

Lyrics: Thaba! Siya sebenzel' iNkosi Siya vuma ukuyenzela<BON:nextLine/>Konke ekushoyo Yona kithi; Sizo kwenza ngokuphelele <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Jesu ngaWe-ke! Sizoqhubeka, Ngokuthokoza<BON:nextLine/>U sibusise Emsebenzini wAkho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngokwenama siyashumayela, Ngothando lwaYo ezizweni<BON:nextLine/>NoJes' ubukhosi buka; Yise Uzothela izibusiso <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngothuthoba silandel' iNkosi; Siyahamba ngokuphelela<BON:nextLine/>Siyabaqondisa abeduki, Kulo iWundlu laY'iNkosi <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-290, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Sebenzela uJesu

Lyrics: Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lifanele iWundlu! Lahlatshwa <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Dumo Aleluya! Mbonge Aleluya!<BON:nextLine/>Dumo Aleluya! I Wundlu! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Msindisi leth' umbuso Uzoqeda izono Letha umbuso wAkho oNgcwele! <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ingathi singahlala siMthanda, siMdumisa Size sifik' eZion' siMbone <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-291, AH-145, SDAH-246)
Title: Li Fanele iWundlu

Lyrics: UJesu-ke ngi zoMsebenzela<BON:nextLine/>Ngolimi-ke ngizoMbonga;<BON:nextLine/>Indletshana zam' zizokuzwa,<BON:nextLine/>Ngizohlabelela ngezwi. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Nkosi, siyeza-ke,<BON:nextLine/>Nxa sise ngabantwana nje<BON:nextLine/>Nkosi, siyeza-ke<BON:nextLine/>Sifunde ngaWe <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngizohamba endleleni yAkhe,<BON:nextLine/>Eya ezulwini lAkhe;<BON:nextLine/>Amehlwana azakufunda,<BON:nextLine/>Zika Jesu izindaba. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngizopha uJesu inhliziyo<BON:nextLine/>Awusindis' umphefumlo;<BON:nextLine/>Inhlalwana yam' ngi Mphe yona,<BON:nextLine/>Okwami ngokwAkhe kona. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-292, AH-462, SDAH-//)
Title: Izandlana Ezimbili

Lyrics: Nqonqo nqonqo ngubani, Umi umi omuhle<BON:nextLine/>Usihamb' esinomusa, Kazang' abonwe onje<BON:nextLine/>Ngaloko mphefumlo wami<BON:nextLine/>Ungeze wavula na? Ungeze wavula na? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nqonqo nqonqo nguJesu, Umi umi omuhle<BON:nextLine/>Isivalo silukhuni, kuthandele ukhula<BON:nextLine/>Lubambe esivalweni<BON:nextLine/>Kunga vulwa kanjani? Kunga vulwa kanjani? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nqonqo nqonqo usemi, Ulindile omuhle<BON:nextLine/>Bon' isandla sinenxeba, Sabethelelwa wena<BON:nextLine/>Namehlo asalindile <BON:nextLine/>Umvimbele njalo na? Umvimbele njalo na? <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-293, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Nqonqo! Nqonqo!

Lyrics: Bheka kuJesu kana sono, Baba ngiph' ukuphila kwAkhe;<BON:nextLine/>Impilo yam' igcwel' isono, Ngembes' impilo yakw' emhlophe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Ngembes' impilo yakw' emhlophe, Ngomazi Yena ngokugcwele;<BON:nextLine/>Ipmilo yam' igcwel' isono, Ngembes' impilo yakw' emhlophe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Made amanxeba esono, Ngiyesab' amabal' abomvu; Jesu, ngembes' impilo yAkho, Ngize ngisind' ekwahluleni. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngikhalel' ukuthethelelwa, Jesu, ngibon' ‘ingub' emhlophe; Ngi ph'eyakho ngi lahla lena, Ngojabula ngihamba naWe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngi buyiswa ngokufa kwakho, Ngenziwe nguYe ngaba mhlophe; Ngi hlanjululwe yizwi lAkhe, Ngi khany'ekubuyeni kwAkhe. <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-294, AH-198, SDAH-412)
Title: Yembesa Ngo Kuphila kwAkhe

Lyrics: Hlabani umkhosi nas' isitha; Vusan' is'miso seNkosi<BON:nextLine/>Hlomani izikhali nonkana, Thembel' an' ezwini leNkosi <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt> <BON:nextLine/>Vukani mabutho, buthanani<BON:nextLine/>Qhubelan' ilizwi phambili<BON:nextLine/>Hambani nimemeze, Hosana!<BON:nextLine/>uKrestu yiNduna yomkhosi <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Amandl' okulwa siyowathola: Sazi ukuthi sonqoba<BON:nextLine/>Isihlangu sethu siyakhanya, Sonqoba ngenxa yokulunga <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nkosi ephakamileyo sizwe, Ngomusa wAkho sisize<BON:nextLine/>Nxa impi yonke isiphelile Siyozuza umqhele kuWe <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-295, AH-469, SDAH-614)
Title: Hlabani uMkhosi weMpi

Lyrics: Msindisi ng'hole kahle, Ngi ngeduk' endleleni<BON:nextLine/>Ngophepha nginga kuWe Ngihleli othandweni <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Ng'hole, ng'hole, Msindisi ng'hole kahle<BON:nextLine/>Ngomusa ungihole, Ngihole yonk' indlela <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Wen' uyinqaba yami, Kuzo zonk' iziphepho<BON:nextLine/>Ngosinda nxa ngi kuWe, Wen' ulithemba lami <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Msindisi, njalo ng'hole, Phesheya kwenhlupheko<BON:nextLine/>Ngofik' ezwen' elihle Laph' inyembez' azikho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-296, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Msindisi Ngi Hole

Lyrics: Kwaba khon' owavuma ‘kufela mina, Ukuz' ongafanel' aphile<BON:nextLine/>Indlela yesiphambano wayihamba, Ezami zaxolelwa zonke <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Zibethelw' emthini, Zibethelw' emthini;<BON:nextLine/>Wezwa ‘buhlung' obukhulu<BON:nextLine/>U Jesu emthini wakhala ngomunyu Ethwel' izono zami lapho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Kimina unesineke ethandeka, Ehlanzis' eyam' inhliziyo<BON:nextLine/>Phinde ngilahlwe sengi nok' khululeka, Ezam' zingezi bethelweyo <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ngonamathel' uMsindisi ngingadeli, Ngohamba ngithokoza njalo<BON:nextLine/>Ng'cule ngomlomo nangenhliziyo yami, Ngith' ezam' zesuliw' izono <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-297, AH-88, SDAH-//)
Title: Zibethelw' Emthini

Lyrics: Yek' ubuhlungu nosizi, Ngihleli nginga kholwa!<BON:nextLine/>Nxa ngisathi kuY' uJesu; Konk' okwam' qha! okwAkho<BON:nextLine/>Konk' okwam' qha! okwAkho, Konk' okwam' qha! okwAkho<BON:nextLine/>Nxa ngisathi kuY' uJesu, Konk' okwam' qha! okwAkho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Noko ngabuya ngabuya, NgaMbon' efa emthini<BON:nextLine/>Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim' nxenye nguWe<BON:nextLine/>Nxenye yim' nxenye nguWe; Nxenye yim' nxenye nguWe<BON:nextLine/>Nenhliziyo yathi kuYe, Nxenye yim' nxenye nguWe <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Nsuku zonke wangi ncenga, Ngelashwa ngohlanzeka<BON:nextLine/>Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke, Ncan' okwam' kun' okwAkho<BON:nextLine/>Ncan' okwam' kun' okwAkho, Ncan' okwam' kun' okwAkho; <BON:nextLine/>Ngehliswa ngazithoba-Ke Ncan' okwam' kun' okwAkho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Luphakeme kunezulu, Lujule kunolwandle<BON:nextLine/>Nkosi, lunqobil' uthando Qha! okwam' konk' okwAkho<BON:nextLine/>Qha! okwam' konk' okwAkho, Qha! okwam' konk' okwAkho<BON:nextLine/>Nkosi, lunqobil' uthando Qha! okwam' konk' okwAkho <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-298, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Qha! Okwami, Konke OkwaAkho

Lyrics: Zename njal' iz'nhliziyo, Kunga ngen' ukusola<BON:nextLine/>Lok' uyasinak' uBaba Es'thanda enomusa <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Mazename njalo njalo, Sizungezwe kukhanya<BON:nextLine/>Inobuhl' indlela yemfanelo Sename njalo njalo <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Siholwa isandla sAkhe, Isono asilutho<BON:nextLine/>Uthembis' ukusisiza Singaphuth' isi' thembiso <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Uma siyek' umsebenzi Sizw' ub' hlungu bokona<BON:nextLine/>Siya mbozwa-mbo ithunzi! Licime ukwethaba <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Yek' injabulo yomsulwa! Ndlela yakh' imhlophe<BON:nextLine/>Masithath' iseluleko, Zond' ok'bi, thand' okuhle <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-299, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Zename Njalo

Lyrics: Khon'ekhaya labangcwele, Bophumul' abeNkosi<BON:nextLine/>Bophumul' abosizi, Bophumul' abosizi<BON:nextLine/>Waya khona uMsindisi Ukufez' ufiso lwam'<BON:nextLine/>Ngophumula nam' <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/><tt>CHORUS</tt><BON:nextLine/>Ngaphesheya kweJordani, Ensimini yasEden'<BON:nextLine/>Ngasemthini wokuphila, Ngophumula nam <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ungilungisele indlu, Eya kuma phakade<BON:nextLine/>Ngoba ngiyohlala njalo, Kulelozwe elihle<BON:nextLine/>Wophumul' okhathele, Wophumul' okhathele<BON:nextLine/>Wophumul' okhathele, Ngophumula nam' <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Ubuhlungu bungengene, Nosizi luyoxoshwa<BON:nextLine/>Kepha ngoba naw' umqhele Wokuphila laphaya!<BON:nextLine/>Zophumul' intandane, Zophumul' intandane<BON:nextLine/>Zophumul' intandane, Ngophumula nam' <BON:nextLine/><BON:nextLine/>Zindl' amafa obukhosi, Hubani ngoku nqoba<BON:nextLine/>Amasango ayovulwa Seningen' ezulwini <BON:nextLine/>Bophumul' abanqobi, Bophumul' abanqobi<BON:nextLine/>Bophumul' abanqobi, Ngophumula nam'? <BON:nextLine/>
Subtitle: (Vern-300, AH-//, SDAH-//)
Title: Mphumula Bakhatheleyo
